channel.title: Help! 562 [PI]
channel.description: For some odd reason, my shops have no background to the interface? lol this is unlike anything i have seen before. Picture below

item.title: Help! 562 [PI]

@beale wrote:

i had the .rar files of the server, and took the client.java without the errors and replaced it with the client.java with errors. not really a help to anyone, but yeah. cause i was the one that caused the error in the first place, so the original client.java didnt have the error.

item.title: Help! 562 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

beale:

so if i change the 23000 to 5064 it should show the background sprites? this isnt only with the shops, it is with the equipment tab too, like where the armor goes, there is no box for the armor slots. same with the tab that says “crush” “slash” ect “special attack” i was in client .java trying to make it so that all of the teleports in the magebook light up and this happened

No, because what I was showing there was an example.

What did you change when you were trying to make the spells light up?

Read full topic

item.title: Help! 562 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:550480”][quote author=Zymus link=topic=669387.msg4476266#msg4476266 date=1426047832]

Are you sure you’re sending the right packet data to the client?
Show the code related to opening shops.

Also: PI is not a 562 server. It’s 317.

The reason I asked if it affected his bank interface as well, is because I believe the shop and bank use the same background image (tiled of course). Since it affects both, I think that image may have been corrupted.
[/quote]
It could be that he changed interfaces (I’ve seen 10001 tutorials that “replace” the bank interface) and now it’s no longer loading.

He could also be sending the wrong packet data as well.

Because, again, I’ve seen tutorials that change the interfaces, and when they do you need to update the packet to go with the new interface. And if you don’t, you get this issue.

Here’s an example:

if (c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.banking = true; c.isBanking = true; c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(23000); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream(); }
This is specifically for my bank.
Now, you see the 23000? On a standard PI, and most 317s, that would be 5064.
The reason it’s not is because I edited the bank and put some new sprites on it’s interface, and of course it was cheaphacked so it’s just a new interface using some of the old content.
If I didn’t change the 23000, I’d have similar issues to what we’re seeing in OP’s post.[/quote]
so if i change the 23000 to 5064 it should show the background sprites? this isnt only with the shops, it is with the equipment tab too, like where the armor goes, there is no box for the armor slots. same with the tab that says “crush” “slash” ect “special attack” i was in client .java trying to make it so that all of the teleports in the magebook light up and this happened

Read full topic

item.title: Help! 562 [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Zymus, post:5, topic:550480”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=669387.msg4476263#msg4476263 date=1426047500]
Are you sure you’re sending the right packet data to the client?
Show the code related to opening shops.

Also: PI is not a 562 server. It’s 317.
[/quote]

The reason I asked if it affected his bank interface as well, is because I believe the shop and bank use the same background image (tiled of course). Since it affects both, I think that image may have been corrupted.[/quote]
It could be that he changed interfaces (I’ve seen 10001 tutorials that “replace” the bank interface) and now it’s no longer loading.

He could also be sending the wrong packet data as well.

Because, again, I’ve seen tutorials that change the interfaces, and when they do you need to update the packet to go with the new interface. And if you don’t, you get this issue.

Here’s an example:

if (c.getOutStream() != null && c != null) { c.banking = true; c.isBanking = true; c.getItems().resetItems(5064); c.getItems().rearrangeBank(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getOutStream().createFrame(248); c.getOutStream().writeWordA(23000); c.getOutStream().writeWord(5063); c.flushOutStream(); }
This is specifically for my bank.
Now, you see the 23000? On a standard PI, and most 317s, that would be 5064.
The reason it’s not is because I edited the bank and put some new sprites on it’s interface, and of course it was cheaphacked so it’s just a new interface using some of the old content.
If I didn’t change the 23000, I’d have similar issues to what we’re seeing in OP’s post.

Read full topic
